about_the_game:
Let the gates open...

Arkell is the embodiment of an open-world RPG, filled with nostalgic gameplay and bursts of enjoyment. It is a single-player exploration into a world of unknowns, a world filled with monsters and devils waiting to strike at any wrong move. Here, we have a balanced amalgamation of action, adventure, and tons of fun.

  • An intense adventure into a world dotted with mountains, rivers, and fields alike
  • High-quality graphics entwined with nostalgic elements to manufacture a truly unique experience
  • Fun and easy combat with realistic enemies and monsters
  • Ambient sounds as backgrounds to create an utterly immersive experience
  • Interactions with NPCs to advance the gameplay and story

short_description: Adventurer! Oh, how glad am I to see you here. Our world is destroyed, held captive by the Demon Lord Agatheus. You must help us, angel from the heavens. You must stop Agatheus, or we may never breathe again...
